00031 std::string FileUtil::getFileAsString(  char* fname){
00032         std::ostringstream outStr;
00033         std::string soutString;
00034         char ch;
00035         std::ifstream inFile( fname);
00036         if(!inFile){
00037                 cout << "Could not open file" << endl; 
00038                 return "";
00039         }
00040         while((ch = inFile.get() ) != EOF){
00041                 outStr << ch;
00042         }
00043         soutString = outStr.str();
00044         inFile.close();
00045         return soutString;
00046 
00047 } // end getFileAsString

00051 char* FileUtil::getFileAsChar(  char* fname){
00052         std::filebuf *pbuf;
00053         long bufsize = 0;
00054         char *xml;
00055         char ch;
00056         std::ifstream inFile;
00057         inFile.open( fname);
00058         // get the input file stream into the buffer
00059         pbuf = inFile.rdbuf();
00060         // now get the size
00061         bufsize = pbuf->pubseekoff(0,std::ios_base::end);
00062         // set back to zero
00063         pbuf ->pubseekpos(0, std::ios::in);
00064         // allocate the character array
00065         xml = new char[bufsize + 1];
00066         xml[ bufsize] =  '\0';
00067         bufsize = 0;
00068         while((ch = inFile.get()) != EOF ){
00069                 xml[ bufsize] = ch;
00070                 bufsize++;
00071         }
00072         return xml;
00073 } // end getFileAsChar

00079 bool FileUtil::writeFileFromString(char* fname, std::string sname){
00080         std::ofstream outFile;
00081         outFile.open( fname);
00082         if(!outFile.is_open()){
00083                 return false;
00084         }
00085         outFile << sname;
00086         outFile.close();
00087         return true;
00088 } // end writeFileFromString

00090 bool FileUtil::writeFileFromString(std::string  fname, std::string sname){

00094                 return false;

00101 bool FileUtil::writeFileFromChar(char* fname, char* ch){
00102         std::ofstream outFile;
00103         outFile.open( fname);
00104         if(!outFile.is_open()){
00105                 return false;
